TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeViewCancelEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 、、 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the , , , and events of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何更改的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，所有节点处于折叠都状态，并且一个处理程序添加到事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added to the event. 接下来，所有节点会展开。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件处理程序确定在给定的节点是否具有检查的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果节点不具有选中的子级，扩展将被取消该节点。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 单击节点旁边的加号，以便正常的节点展开然后删除事件处理程序。In order to allow normal node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行为还可以通过处理事件，如该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 有关完整示例，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1/CPP/treeviewshowcheckednodes1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1/CS/treeviewshowcheckednodes1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewShowCheckedNodes1/VB/treeviewshowcheckednodes1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`TreeView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TreeView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#626](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#626)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#626](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#626)]

summary.span: 获取要选中、展开、折叠或选择的树节点。

span.span: Gets the tree node to be checked, expanded, collapsed, or selected.

value.span: 要选中、展开、折叠或选择的 。

span.span: The to be checked, expanded, collapsed, or selected.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何更改的折叠状态，以便所有选中的节点都可见。The following example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，所有节点处于折叠都状态，并且一个处理程序添加到事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added to the event. 接下来，所有节点会展开。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件处理程序确定在给定的节点是否具有检查的子节点。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果节点不具有选中的子级，扩展将被取消该节点。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 单击节点旁边的加号，以便正常的节点展开然后删除事件处理程序。In order to allow normal node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行为还可以通过处理事件，如该主题的示例中所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic. 有关完整示例，请参阅参考主题。For the complete example, see the reference topic.
